name: Days of Dawn \u2013 A Fantasy RPG
blurb: Explore a world whose magic just came alive in this beautiful RPG  with a unique magic system (PC,Mac,Linux,Android)

rewards.reward: No Reward
Support Days of Dawn and get the chance to become painted and transformed into one of the games characters (see update #6 for details, applies to every backer)

Thank you so much for supporting Days of Dawn! As a thank-you for your support, you'll get a set of backer-exclusive WALLPAPERS from Days of Dawn, the main theme as a DRM-free MP3-FILE and a Days of Dawn RINGTONE for your phone.

For early backers only: You'll get a DRM-free version of the DOWNLOADABLE GAME for Windows, Mac and Linux plus all the wallpapers, the song and ringtone mentioned above for just 15$. You will also be credited in the game as a backer.\r\nWallpaper, ringtone and main theme will become sent out by January 2013.

You'll get a DRM-free version of the DOWNLOADABLE GAME for Windows, Mac, Linux and Android plus all the wallpapers, the song and ringtone mentioned above. You will also be credited in the game as a backer. Wallpaper, ringtone and main theme will become sent out by January 2013. This applies to the other 20$-tier too and is just added to make clear that the android-version is included.

You'll get a DRM-free version of the DOWNLOADABLE GAME for Windows, Mac and Linux plus all the wallpapers, the song and ringtone mentioned above. You will also be credited in the game as a backer.\r\nWallpaper, ringtone and main theme will become sent out by January 2013.
Besides the downloadable game, ringtone and wallpapers you'll also get the COMPLETE SOUNDTRACK as a DRM-free MP3 download.

This will give you the GAMES ARTBOOK featuring 100 richly illustrated and beautifully designed color pages of the games art, team and progress as a downloadable PDF document. Also included everything from the 25$ deal - downloadable game, wallpapers, mp3 soundtrack and ringtone.

This reward will give you a 23x33" inch / DIN A1 GAME POSTER personally signed by Tassilo, creator of the game. You, the backers, will be able to vote for the design to print later on. Also included everything from above (game, ringtone, wallpaper, PDF artbook, MP3 soundtrack, special ingame-item).

You'll get the games SOUNDTRACK ON A LIMITED EDITION CD only available in this funding campaign, personally signed by Sound of Games, composers of the games music. Also included all the rewards from above (game, ringtone, wallpaper, PDF artbook, MP3 soundtrack, special ingame-item & poster).

EARLY BIRD DEAL: We'll be giving away 250 of the beautifully designed COLLECTOR'S EDITION BOXED VERSION of the game for only 69$! This wonderful pack comes along with a richly illustrated full-color MANUAL and the GAME-CD including the Windows-, Mac- and Linux-versions of the game plus all the other content from the 99$-pack. First come, first serve.

This deal will also bring you the finely printed HARDCOVER VERSION of the GAMES ARTBOOK featuring 100 richly illustrated and beautifully designed color pages of the games art, team and progress. Also includes everything from the packs above (game, ringtone, wallpaper, PDF artbook, MP3 soundtrack, special ingame-item & poster).

For 99$, you'll get the beautifully designed COLLECTOR'S EDITION BOXED VERSION of the game including a richly illustrated full-color MANUAL and the GAME-CD including the Windows-, Mac- and Linux-versions of the game plus all the contents from above (game, ringtone, wallpaper, printed hardcover artbook, MP3 and limited edition CD soundtrack, special ingame-item & poster).

Here you'll get the PANDORA-(Android)-VERSION of the game on a SD-card plus all the content from the 99$ pack (boxed collector's edition of the PC, Mac and Linux-versions, game, ringtone, wallpaper, printed hardcover artbook, MP3 and signed limited edition CD soundtrack, special ingame-item & poster) and exclusive access to the beta-versions of Days of Dawn Pandora.

For 150$, you'll get a backer-exclusive GOTS-certified organic cotton T-SHIRT. These shirts won't be available outside of the funding.\r\nIncludes all the wonderful rewards from the 99$ deal (game, ringtone, wallpaper, printed hardcover artbook, MP3 and limited edition CD soundtrack, special ingame-item & poster, card-game and the Collector's Edition box).

In this true collectors deal you will get a LIMITED EDITION ACRYLATE FIGURINE OF "HAIRMO", one of Days of Dawns original creatures, handpainted by a talented figurepainting artist. This detailed figure is limited to 100 pieces and won't be available outside of this campaign.\r\nAlso includes all the goodies from the 150$ deal (game, ringtone, wallpaper, printed hardcover artbook, MP3 and limited edition CD soundtrack, special ingame-item & poster, card game and the Collector's Edition box plus t-shirt).

Help us in designing the game! Besides all the rewards from our 250$ deal, you'll be able to DESIGN A SIDE QUEST* for the games heroes to accomplish. Working closely with our team, you'll get the chance to see your story idea being transformed into the game. Includes all the other gifts from above as well (game, ringtone, wallpaper, printed hardcover artbook, MP3 and limited edition CD soundtrack, special ingame-item & poster, card game, hairmo figure and the Collector's Edition box plus t-shirt).\r\n(*according to some restrictions like for example the games overall story)

Digital game + real art: In this package you'll all the digital contents from the $30-pack plus a fine printed SIGNED CONCEPT ARTWORKS from Tyler coming in a beautiful frame and limited to this kickstarter-campaign. We will produce a very maximum of ten of these prints (depending on the number of pledges), making them a valuable collector's item. Also included: download game, ringtone, wallpaper, PDF artbook, MP3 soundtrack, special ingame-item.

Along with all the rewards mentioned above, this one will add a STATUE OF YOURSELF to be found in the game. Scenery artist Tyler Edlin will create a stone-version of yourself (please deliver a photo) with a plaque reading your name.\r\nIncludes all the 250$-goodies  (game, ringtone, wallpaper, printed hardcover artbook, MP3 and limited edition CD soundtrack, special ingame-item & poster, card game, hairmo figure and the Collector's Edition box plus t-shirt).

The stunning DELUXE COLLECTOR'S EDITION comes limited to 100 copies available in this campaign only and with the following content: A numbered certificate signed by Tassilo, a Days of Dawn cardgame, a beautifully designed cloth-map, an embossed Days of Dawn coin plus the artbook, t-shirt, soundtrack-CD, posteer, hairmo and everything from the $30-tier.

This is another cool one: You will be working with Nadia Enis, our creature designer, to CREATE YOUR VERY OWN MONSTER which will be part of the game. You're completely free in how to deliver your ideas, be it a written description or a sketch. You'll also get a fine print of your monster in a frame and all the stuff from the 250$ deal  (game, ringtone, wallpaper, printed hardcover artbook, MP3 and limited edition CD soundtrack, special ingame-item & poster, card game, hairmo figure and the Collector's Edition box plus t-shirt).

Art Collector Time! In this package you'll get the whole 250$-bundle plus a fine printed SIGNED CONCEPT ARTWORKS from Tyler coming in a beautiful frame and limited to this kickstarter-campaign. We will produce a very maximum of ten of these prints (depending on the number of pledges), making them a valuable collector's item. \r\nAll the items you get for 250$ will also come along (game, ringtone, wallpaper, printed hardcover artbook, MP3 and limited edition CD soundtrack, special ingame-item & poster, card game, hairmo figure and the Collector's Edition box plus t-shirt).

In this beautiful deal you will get a stunning LIMITED EDITION CUSTOM 1GHz PANDORA, limited to 10 devices worldwide, coming in a beautiful Days of Dawn look and signed by "EvilDragon", one of the device's developers inside of the handheld plus all the contents from the 250$ package (hairmo miniature, game, ringtone, wallpaper, printed hardcover artbook, MP3 and limited edition CD soundtrack, special ingame-item & poster and the Collector's Edition box plus t-shirt) and exclusive access to the beta-versions of Days of Dawn Pandora..

Ever dreamed of being part of a fantasy world? Make your dream come true \u2013 with this reward we'll make you BECOME A NON-PLAYER CHARACTER, painted by our character artist Anako and send you a framed fine print of the painting. Also included are all items from the $250 package (game, ringtone, wallpaper, printed hardcover artbook, MP3 and limited edition CD soundtrack, special ingame-item & poster, card game, hairmo figure and the Collector's Edition box plus t-shirt).

BE AN INN-KEEPER! Being a NPC is not enough? Why don't you run your own inn on Kalea? You'll be able to design your own place in the games world (given some rules to be discussed) in which you will be found living as a NPC, painted by our character artist Daria. Also included are all items from the $250 package (game, ringtone, wallpaper, printed hardcover artbook, MP3 and limited edition CD soundtrack, special ingame-item & poster, card game, hairmo figure and the Collector's Edition box plus t-shirt).

You will be attending a FULL DAY ORCHESTRA RECORDING SESSION of the games soundtrack with Sound of Games and an actual orchestra in Europe (travel costs not included). Also included are all items from the $250 package (game, ringtone, wallpaper, printed hardcover artbook, MP3 and limited edition CD soundtrack, special ingame-item & poster, card game, hairmo figure and the Collector's Edition box plus t-shirt).

Okay, now this is very, very, very special \u2013 you are going to BECOME A HERO! With this gift we'll transform a photo of you into one of the games seven available player characters and send you a framed fine print of the painting. Also included are all items from the $250 package (game, ringtone, wallpaper, printed hardcover artbook, MP3 and limited edition CD soundtrack, special ingame-item & poster, card game, hairmo figure and the Collector's Edition box plus t-shirt).

You want it all? With this package you will be credited as "GAME PRODUCER" in the game, will become PORTRAYED as one of the games NPC (see above), will be able to create YOUR OWN MONSTER, which our creature department will transform into one of Days of Dawns animated creatures and get all items from the $250 package (game, ringtone, wallpaper, printed hardcover artbook, MP3 and limited edition CD soundtrack, special ingame-item & poster, card game, hairmo figure and the Collector's Edition box plus t-shirt). Last but not least you will become invited to a great night out with many of our team-members during the gamescom 2013 in Cologne, worlds largest game trade fair (travel cost not included).
